title: How to Take an Unplugged Vacation with Courtney Scott
description:
Between tourists FaceTiming on the streets and Instagram influencers posting perfect travel photos, it seems like we need to document our every move while on vacation. Guest host and filmmaker Courtney Scott (@court_scott) interviews Tansy Kaschak, Sustainability Editor for @AHotelLife and Heather Lilleston, founder of @YogaforBadPeople, for tips on how to actually disconnect and recharge during your next vacation.

Send us your travel stories at podcast@expedia.com or find us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram @Expedia!
